amendment.description: Amendment authorizes a science communications initiative at the National Science Foundation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in the Congressional Record to provide grant supplements, on a competitive, merit-reviewed basis, to institutions receiving awards under the Integrative Graduate Education and Research Traineeship program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Matsui amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 232 - 186 (Roll no. 293).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Ms. Matsui.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
